resources.string:
Our application collects the following data:

- Financial transaction records (title, amount, category, date)
- PIN code (stored encrypted)
- Biometric authentication preferences
- Application settings and preferences

ALL DATA IS STORED ONLY ON YOUR DEVICE.
No data is sent to our servers.

We use the collected data only for the following purposes:

- To track your financial transactions
- To provide income/expense analysis
- To personalize your app experience
- To provide security and authentication

Your data is NEVER shared with third parties.

For your data security:

- PIN codes are protected with AES-256 encryption
- Biometric authentication uses Android Keystore
- Database can be encrypted with SQLCipher (optional)
- All data is stored locally on your device

No internet connection required, data is not stored in the cloud.

You have full control over your data:

- Right to access: You can view all your data
- Right to rectification: You can edit your data at any time
- Right to erasure: You can permanently delete all your data using the "Delete All Data" option
- Right to data portability: You can export your data via CSV export

Data deletion is IRREVERSIBLE.

The app may request the following permissions:

- Notification permission: For reminder notifications
- Biometric permission: For fingerprint/face recognition
- Storage permission: For CSV export (Android 12 and below)

All permissions are OPTIONAL and the app can perform its core functions without them.

This application:

- Does NOT use cookies
- Does NOT track user behavior
- Does NOT use analytics services
- Does NOT show advertisements

Offers a completely ad-free and tracking-free experience.
Our app does not knowingly collect data from children under 13.\n\nShould not be used by users under 13 without parental consent.

This privacy policy may be updated from time to time.

Significant changes will be announced via in-app notifications.

Last updated: %1$s

For privacy-related questions:

Email: privacy@HesapGunlugu.com

We try to respond within 48 hours.
